page.title: 01GAZETTEER of area NW of WARE
page.content:
This area is administered by the East Hertfordshire District Council and is in the parliamentary constituency of Hertford and Stevenage.
This is an agricultural area with some light industry. The A10 runs through the SE corner and two villages have developed along this route. Someone passing through might mistakenly think there was just one community but the River Rib divides Wadesmill to the North from Thundridge to the South. There are now new housing developments adding to the vitality of the villages.
The smaller settlements of Chapmore End Westmill and Tonwell nestle in the gently rolling countryside. The area has many footpaths and on one walk an old derelict house and garden was found
